nodes.text: The GT-27 Plasma Core Assault Cannon was a model of personal blaster cannon available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.
The GT-27 Plasma Core Assault Cannon was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Mid Rim Explorer Pack, which was released to the Cartel Market on June 9, 2015.
